comment: Excellent print quality and content. Teachers are very satisfied with the latest edition.
response: Thank you for the positive feedback. We'll continue to maintain quality standards.

comment: Request to add more practical examples in Physics book. Teachers feel theory is comprehensive but lacks hands-on application examples.
response: We're working on adding practical examples for the next edition. Expected completion by Q1 2026.

comment: Competitive pricing appreciated. School administration finds our pricing better than competitors.
response: Great to hear! We strive to provide value for money.

comment: High-quality content, well-received by teachers. Binding quality is excellent and students appreciate the illustrations.
response: Thank you for the feedback. We're glad our quality standards are being appreciated.

comment: School is currently using Oxford publications. They mentioned our content is good but Oxford has better teacher support materials.
IB curriculum alignment needs improvement. Some chapters don't align perfectly with current IB syllabus.
response: We're revising the content to align better with updated IB syllabus. Timeline: 3 months.

comment: Minor printing issue noticed in batch sent last month. Some pages had faint text.
response: Replacement batch sent. Quality control measures strengthened at printing facility.

comment: Late delivery affected the school's planning. Request better coordination with logistics team.
response: Apologies for the delay. We're improving our logistics coordination.
